maqras.text: Glorify nazva vashoho Lorda, naybilʹsh Vysokoho
Vin stvoryuye ta formy
Vin zamyslyuye ta dovidnyky
Vin vyroblyaye pasovyshche
Todi povertaye tse u svitle sino
My budemo deklamuvaty do vas; ne zabudʹte
Vse ye z·hidno z BOZHYM bude; Vin znaye shcho zayavlyayetʹsya, ta shcho ye prykhovanyy
My napravymo vas do naybilʹsh lehkoho shlyakhu
Tomu, vy budete nahadaty; mozhlyvo reminder bude vyhoda
shanoblyvyy vizʹmutʹ uvahu
bezputnyy unyknutʹ tse
Otzhe, vin postrazhdaye velykyy Hellfire
Prychomu vin nikoly ne vmyraye, ne perebuvannya zhyvi
Uspishnyy diysno yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto vykupovuye yoho dushu
pam'yatayuchy nazvu yoho Lorda ta zauvazhuyuchykh kontaktnykh molytv (Salat)
Diysno, vy preoccupied z tse pershe zhyttya
Nezvazhayuchy na te, shcho U maybutnʹomu daleko krashche ta everlasting
Tse zapysuyetʹsya u bilʹsh rannikh vykladanni
vykladannya Abraham ta Moses
Znayete vy Perevazhni
Oblychchya na shcho denʹ bude shamed
Laboring ta vysnazhenyy
Strazhdannya u palayuchomu Hellfire
P'yutʹ z flaming vesna
Vony budutʹ ne maty prodovolʹstva krim daremnoho riznovydu
Tse nikoly nourishes, ne ne zadovolʹnyaye holod
Inshi oblychchya na shcho denʹ bude povnyy radosti
Zadovolʹnyav z yikhnʹoyu robotoyu
U exalted Ray
U tse, niyake bez·hluzdya chuyetʹsya
U tse, vesna teche
U tse, ye rozkishne vbrannya
Ta napiy zrobleni nayavnyy
Ta hleky lavamy
Ta kylymy vsyudy
Chomu vony ne viddzerkalyuyutʹ na verblyudakh ta yak vony utvoryuyutʹsya
Ta nebo ta yak yomu pidnimayetʹsya
Ta hory ta yak vony konstruyuyutʹsya
Ta zemlya ta yak yomu buduyetʹsya
Vy budete nahadaty, dlya vashoyi misiyi musyte dostavyty tse reminder
Vy ne mayete enerhetychnoho nad nymy
Yak dlya tsykh khto prohanyayutʹ ta disbelieve
BOH zdiysnytʹ yikh do velykoho retribution
Do nas ye yikhnya ostatochna dolya
Todi my zaklykayemo yikh vvazhaty
svitankom
Ta desyatʹ nochi
rivnyy ta nezvychaynyy
nichchyu yak tse propuskaye
hlyboka klyatva, dlya odnoho khto volodiye rozvidkoyu
vy vidznachyly yakoho vashoho Lorda `aad
Erum; misto z vysokymy budynkamy
Tam vyhlyadalo nichoho yak tse anywhere
Takozh Thamoud, khto vyrizav skeli u yikhnʹomu valley
Ta Pharaoh khto ovolodiv mozhe
Vony vsi porusheni u zemli
Vony rozpovsyudzhuyutʹsya zlo vsyudy
Otzhe, vash Lord lyvsya na nykh whipping retribution
Vash Lord ye kolysʹ watchful
Koly lyudsʹke isnuvannya vyprobovuyetʹsya yoho Lordom, cherez blahoslovennya ta radistʹ, vin kazhe, "Miy Lord ye velykodushnyy do meni
Ale yakshcho Vin vyprobovuye yoho cherez zmenshennya u umovakh, vin kazhe, "Miy Lord prynyzhuye meni
Nepravylʹnyy! Tse - vy kotri prynesly tse na sebe ne roz·hlyadayuchy syrotu
Ta ne zakhyshchayucha dobrodiynistʹ do bidna
Ta spozhyvannya spadkovistʹ bezporadnykh syrot
Ta lyublyachi hroshi nadto znachno
Diysno, koly zemlya davytʹsya, nadzvychayno davytʹsya
Ta vash Lord prybuvaye, razom z anhelamy u ryadi pislya ryadu
Na shcho denʹ, Gehenna bude porodzhuvatysya. Na shcho denʹ, lyudsʹke isnuvannya zapam'yataye - ale shcho spohad - tse bude nadto pizno
Vin skazhe, "O, ya bazhayu I hotovoho do moho (vichnyy) zhyttya
Na shcho denʹ, niyakyy retribution ne mih buty hirshyy nizh Yoho retribution
Ta niyake obmezhennya ne ye take efektyvne yak Yoho obmezhennya
Yak dlya vas, O vmistu dusha
Vertayutʹ do vashoho Lorda, zadovolenoho ta harnoho
Vitayutʹ u Moyikh sluzhbovtsiv
Vitayutʹ u Miy Ray
